name: Merge Dogs - Idle Clicker
description:
Merge Dogs - Idler Clicker - An amazing idle game with dogs theme . Be ready to discover new dog breeds, put them to the race, earn money and crush the tournament in this awesome idle tycoon game. New adventure is awaiting you to uncover!

HOW TO PLAY:
- Merge two of the same dog to create new one.
- Watch them race and earn money..
- User help from interesting booster to faster your progress.

FEATURES:
- Over 30 dogs breed to unlock: corgi, dachshund, french bulldog and so much more!
- Idler earning, gain coin even when you are offline.
- Great graphics and cute puppies..
- In-game leaderboard to compete with other players over the world.
- Easy to sync the game between your devices.
- No WIFI? No problem! You can enjoy blasting anywhere!
- No app permission required.

Download Merge Dogs - Idler Clicker and start merging now!

Last but not least, a big Thank You to anyone who played Merge Dogs - Idler Clicker
